infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: CaloriePad uses your health data to calculate calories burned and provide personalized insights for your daily calorie tracking.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: CaloriePad can write workout data to Apple Health to keep your fitness information synchronized.
